results.name: The Potato Game for Gameboy Color
The Brew Crew in: Bubbling Paradise!

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Pentium Dual-Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: macOS 32 bit not supported
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: macOS 32 bit not supported

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Core i3 Processor, 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Core i5 Processor, 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
